com.corm.session.util

Class SessionUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.corm.session.util.SessionUtil

  • public class SessionUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    SessionUtil is a utility class which simplifies the cassandra cluster setup as well as bootstraps the ORM framework.
    Author:
    Chandrasekar Sankarram - Contact:cassandra.orm@gmail.com

      • init

        public static void init(java.lang.String scanPath,
        java.lang.String[] servers,
        int portNumber)
        Initialize the session factory by performing scan and discovery of ORM participating entity .
        Parameters:
        scanPath - Path of entity aware beans usually expressed as package.*" and multiple paths separated by ,
        servers - contact points for Cassandra nodes.
        portNumber - Cassandra node port number.
